concept.title: Social Metrics
concept.shortdesc: You can add Social metrics to reporting and analytics metric reports. These metrics are used in Social, which helps you understand how conversations in social media (like Twitter and Facebook) affect brand perception, channel activity, and key business metrics. For example, you can know how often a product is mentioned, gauge product sentiment, and then see how social metrics correlate with your key performance indicators in the Key Metrics Report.

conbody.p: Examples of Social Metrics are Mentions, Total Sentiment, and Potential Audience.
